info.name: All APIs
info.description:
This is an api documentation for Ward and District Officer

Note: to run this api, you must obtain the access_token_key by login as Ward or District Officer

request.description:
This api used by officer to update a specified report by its id

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `status` | enums(DONE, NEW, PENDING) | status of report |
| `resolvedContent` | string | the resolved content of report |

This api used by officer to update a specified report by its id

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `status` | enums(DONE, NEW, PENDING) | status of report |
| `resolvedContent` | string | the resolved content of report |
This api returns detail of report by id

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Desscription** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | number (default = 1) | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |
| `take` | number (default = 10) | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `typeId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier, used for filtering or categorizing data |
| `targetType` | enum (Location, Panel) | Specifies the type of target entities to be included in the results |
| `status` | enums(DONE, NEW, PENDING) | Represents the status of the items to be retrieved |
| `take` | number (default = 10) | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `userUuid` | string | Determines the user that send this report, store this into localStorage |

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Desscription** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | number (default = 1) | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |
| `take` | number (default = 10) | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `typeId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier, used for filtering or categorizing data |
| `targetType` | enum (Location, Panel) | Specifies the type of target entities to be included in the results |
| `status` | enums(DONE, NEW, PENDING) | Represents the status of the items to be retrieved |
| `wards` | string | Represents a string value, related to geographical, can contains many value |
| `districts` | string | Represents a string value, related to geographical at the district level. |

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Desscription** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `districtIds` | number\[\] | List of filtered districts |
| `wardIds` | number\[\] | List of filtered districts |
| `dateValue` | Date | Start date |
| `dateType` | enum (MONTH, YEAR) | Type of return statistic, by month (30,31 elements for days) or by year (12 elements for 12 month) |

This API is SSE api type, make this realtime and make sure to closed this when unmount.

Params: :userUuid

userUuid is stored when user submit report

Response: a JSON stringifyed string when a report of this user is updated.

This API is SSE api type, make this realtime and make sure to closed this when unmount.

Params: :userId

userId is the id of officer

Response: a JSON stringifyed string when a report is created.

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `userId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a user. |
| `reason` | string | Describes the reason associated with a request. |
| `panelId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a panel. |

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `status` | enum (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, CANCELED) | Represents the status of the ads-request to be retrieved |

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Description** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `status` | enum (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, CANCELED) | Represents the status of the ads-request to be retrieved |
This API returns detailed information for an ads request based on its ID

| **Attribute** | **Type** | **Desscription** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | number (default = 1) | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |
| `take` | number (default = 10) | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `targetType` | enum (Location, Panel) | Specifies the type of target entities to be included in the results |
| `status` | enum (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED, CANCELED) | Represents the status of the items to be retrieved |
| `wards` | string | Represents a string value, related to geographical, can contains many value |
| `districts` | string | Represents a string value, related to geographical at the district level, can contains many value |
| `type` | enum(UPDATE_DATE, APPROVED_PANEL) | Specifies the type of target entities to be included in the results |

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `images` | file | Represents new images |
| `typeId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier, indicating the type of the uploaded content. |
| `width` | number | Specifies the width of the panel. |
| `height` | number | Specifies the height of the panel. |
| `locationId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a location. |
| `createContractDate` | string | Indicates the date and time when a contract was created. |
| `expiredContractDate` | string | Indicates the date and time when the contract is set to expire. |
| `companyEmail` | string | Represents the email associated with a company. |
| `companyNumber` | number | Represents the numerical identifier or registration number of a company. |
| `userId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a user. |
| `reason` | string | Describes the reason associated with a request. |
| `belongPanelId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a panel to which the image belongs. |

formdata.value: Trường đại học Khoa học Tự nhiên

request.description:
| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `images` | file | Represents new images |
| `typeId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier, indicating the type of the uploaded content. |
| `adsTypeId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with the type of advertisements. |
| `long` | number | Represents the longitude coordinates of the location. |
| `lat` | number | Represents the latitude coordinates of the location. |
| `isPlanning` | boolean | Indicates whether the location is in the planning stage (true) or not (false). |
| `districtId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with the district of the location. |
| `wardId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with the ward of the location. |
| `fullAddress` | string | Represents the full address of the location. |
| `name` | string | Represents the name of the location. |
| `userId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with a user. |
| `reason` | string | Describes the reason for updating the location. |
| `belongLocationId` | number | Represents a numerical identifier associated with old location. |

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | number | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |
| `take` | number | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `districts` | string | Represents numerical identifiers or codes of districts. Multiple values are separated by commas. |
| `wards` | string | Represents numerical identifiers or codes of wards. Multiple values are separated by commas. |
| `status` | enum (APPROVED, AWAITING_UPDATE) | Represents the status of the location. |

| Attribute | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `page` | number | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |
| `take` | number | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
| `districts` | string | Represents numerical identifiers or codes of districts. Multiple values are separated by commas. |
| `wards` | string | Represents numerical identifiers or codes of wards. Multiple values are separated by commas. |
| `status` | enum (APPROVED, AWAITING_UPDATE) | Represents the status of the location. |
This API returns detailed information for a location based on its ID

This API returns a list of panels belonging to a specified location

  
| Attribute | Type | Description |  
| --- | --- | --- |  
| `page` | number | Specifies the page number of the results to retrieve |  
| `take` | number | Determines the number of items to retrieve per page |
